entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
